snippet.title: GG Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible Special
snippet.description:
Support Shiryu on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Shiryu
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/

"Wizardry" fans rejoice because "Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last bible Special" not only plays a lot like a game in the series, it has now been fully translated to English thanks to the efforts of MrRichard999, the SSTranslations team and Tom. This is the fifth game in the "Megami Tensei" series and the second to be released on the Game Gear. Enjoy!

Romhacking.net Project Page: http://www.romhacking.net/translations/3160/
